original_text: I and my brothers and my men are also lending the people money and grain. But let us stop charging interest!
korean_text: 나와 내 형제와 종자들도 역시 돈과 양식을 백성에게 꾸어 주었거니와 우리가 그 이자 받기를 그치자

sentences.original_text: I and my brothers and my men
are also lending the people money and grain
But let us stop charging interest
